metadata.title: VIROPORIN ACTIVITY OF SARS-CoV E PROTEIN

abstract.original_text: HB assay and construction of plasmids: HeLa cells were transfected with appropriate plasmids, pretreated with different concentrations of HB (Sigma), and labeled with [ 35 S] methionine/cysteine (Amersham). Cells were incubated in the presence or absence of HB, harvested and lysed. Total proteins were immunoprecipitated with appropriate antibodies, and analyzed by SDS 15% polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis.

sentences.segment_text: HB assay and construction of plasmids : HeLa cells were transfected with appropriate plasmids ,
pretreated with different concentrations of HB ( Sigma ) ,
and labeled with ( 35 S ) methionine/cysteine ( Amersham ) .
Cells were incubated in the presence or absence of HB , harvested and lysed .
Total proteins were immunoprecipitated with appropriate antibodies ,
and analyzed by SDS 15 % polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis .

abstract.original_text: Plasmids pFlagE and pFlagN was constructed by cloning an EcoRV-and EcoRIdigested PCR fragments into EcoRV-and EcoRI-digested pFlag vector. The Flag-tag was fused to the N-terminal end of the E protein. Mutations were introduced into the E gene by two rounds of PCR and confirmed by automated sequencing. The mutant constructs included in this study are summarized in Fig. 1.

abstract.original_text: Alteration of Membrane Permeability by the Expression of E Protein
